new-user-welcome-intro[0]: Let's tailor the Hub to meet your needs.
new-user-welcome-intro[1]: You can always change your account settings.
company-sectors-intro: Tell us about your sector, so we can support your business in setting robust emission ambitions.
solution-interests-title: What solutions are you interested in exploring?
solution-interests-intro: Tell us about the solutions you are interested in exploring, so we can optimise your experience.
invitations-title: Which companies do you want to connect with?
invitations-intro: These companies invited you to be part of their network. Connect with them so you can share your emission estimation with your customers and request your scope 3 data from your suppliers.
invitations-api-error: Something went wrong please try again to connect
incoming-relationship-connect-success: You are now connected to {{ companyName }}
